148db1ca-0ae2-45d2-807a-bbd1ccf784a2.description: The Deepwatch Expert Engineer Program - Certified Engineer (DEEP-ce) credential recognizes the expertise of our Partner Solution Engineers and Architects on building and evolving a modern SOC - including deploying effective detection and response for advanced threats, and solving business challenges with solutions to mature security operations.
148db1ca-0ae2-45d2-807a-bbd1ccf784a2.name: Deepwatch Expert Engineer Program - Certified Engineer (DEEP-ce)

badge_template_activities.title: The Deepwatch Expert Engineer Program - Certified Engineer (DEEP-ce) credential is awarded after completion of an in-person, instructor facilitated training session. These sessions are anchored around conversations, shared experiences, and real-world examples to provide greater understanding of Deepwatch’s services, the technologies and methodologies used, insight into Deepwatch’s differentiators, and how customer challenges are solved.
